content:
@AbdulMalik Shakir:

  • the stated version fixed-business-version is 2.0 - why? the previous version was 0.1.0, and this should be 0.2.0
  • the npm name should be hl7.fhir.us.bser not hl7.fhir.bser
so that's progress from last time, but not there yet. Also, you don't have a package-list.json file
@Adam Holmes @AbdulMalik Shakir BSER is nearly there - a couple of very minor issues in the qa : https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/bser/qa.html (see HL7 publication check)
ok thanks both. bser is now good to go. One very minor point: all the menu options in the navbar are capitalised except for 'history'
